Thousand Year Ginseng

(No Effect on Undead [undeadimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok], No effect on Inanimate [inanimateimmune])
The mystics and hermits of T'ien Ch'i have always been obsessed with longevity. During the Time of the Bureaucracy and the prevalence of herbal medicine, one means to this end was found. The Thousand Year Ginseng will give the imbiber longevity and good health and is the closest to immortality one can come without practicing Internal Alchemy.
Age -5 years
